doc: The pathname to a file defining the details of the job for which we are going to generate the input file/s.
The pathname of theouput of the input writing taks, i.e., the input file for the job for which we are going to generate the input file/s.
The pathname's root of any input file for the job for which we are going to generate the input file/s.
Prevents the writing of the job specific JSON file with the definition of a job that is specific for a certain input (e.g., molecular-specific job).
Sets the amount of log messages. Larger values result in more detailed log reports.
